Intro to Welding

Sun Nov 14 2021

This workshop was a hands-on beginners introduction to MIG welding. Participants were given an overview of the welding process and welding tools and materials, and were able to practice on small pieces and create their own metal garden trellis. People had a lot of fun!

Getting an overview of the MIG welding process and safety gear.
Hands-on practice with the MIG welder.
The outdoor workshop setup - sparks flying!
Close-up of practice welds - learning to lay down a good bead.
Welding helmets, gloves, and supplies ready for participants.
Working with metal stock to create garden trellises.
The workshop continued into the evening - welding is even more dramatic at dusk!
